EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery.Send Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New IHL Webinar: Decoding New Grocery Shopper Behaviors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Decoding today’s new consumer behavior: Register for our new Grocery Experience (GX) webinar August 20, 2020 | 1-2pm ET ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you feel that? Consumer behavior just shifted beneath your feet.
Today’s grocery shopper is less loyal. And they’re mobile like never before (30% of people who bought groceries online in March did so for the first. time. ever.).
Register now for our Grocery Experience webinar to understand and better serve today’s changing customers.
It’s an interactive discussion for grocers about what shoppers want now, where the grocery industry is heading and how leading retailers are preparing for it with a next-generation retail architecture. Join the conversation! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Date: August 20, 2020 Time: 1-2pm Eastern Speakers & Panelists:
- Tom Chittenden, Vice President, NCR Retail Products - Greg Buzek, Founder and President of IHL Group - Lou Labenskyj, Chief Information Security Officer of Bashas - Harrison Lewis, CIO of Northgate Market ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
